ygData.subject: Re: Financial Aid
ygData.msgSnippet: it s easy, the more expensive the stones get, the harder they are. work on a stone till it becomes trivial to make it with silver, then go to the next
ygData.messageBody:
it's easy, the more expensive the stones get, the harder they are. work on
a stone till it becomes trivial to make it with silver, then go to the next
expensive stone. when you get through all the stones, start over with
electrum and the cheapest stones. repeat with gold and platinum. enchanted
metals dont make it any harder.

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 14th lvl enchanter
